attributes.action: To cancel GCSE & A levels for 2021, not just issue insufficient provisions
attributes.additional_details: Year 10 and lower 6 curriculum was significantly affected. The first term of year 11 and upper 6 has also been significantly affected. There is talk about stricter lockdown measures. Students don’t know whether they will be in school or home schooling & the anxiety that it is causing so many students of how they are going to focus & get through their exams to which they have been working so well towards until the pandemic struck, is heightening their anxiety and making their mental health worse
attributes.background: The provisions issued by Parliament so far are insufficient to level the playing field with other pupils of the United Kingdom, nor do the provisions deal with the mental health issues that the pandemic has caused many pupils. These are affecting both their learning & social interaction ability
